description: Provides metadata information about a bot recommendation. This information will enable you to get a description on the request inputs, to download associated transcripts after processing is complete, and to download intents and slot-types generated by the bot recommendation.

parameters.name: botId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the bot associated with the bot recommendation.

parameters.name: botVersion
parameters.description: The version of the bot associated with the bot recommendation.

parameters.name: localeId
parameters.description: The identifier of the language and locale of the bot recommendation to describe. The string must match one of the supported locales. For more information, see Supported languages.

parameters.name: botRecommendationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the bot recommendation to describe.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the bot associated with the bot recommendation.

nested_items.name: botVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the bot associated with the bot recommendation.

nested_items.name: localeId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the language and locale of the bot recommendation to describe.

nested_items.name: botRecommendationStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the bot recommendation. If the status is Failed, then the reasons for the failure are listed in the failureReasons field.

nested_items.name: botRecommendationId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the bot recommendation being described.

nested_items.name: failureReasons
nested_items.description: If botRecommendationStatus is Failed, Amazon Lex explains why.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the bot recommendation was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the bot recommendation was last updated.

nested_items.name: transcriptSourceSetting
nested_items.description: The object representing the Amazon S3 bucket containing the transcript, as well as the associated metadata.

nested_items.name: s3BucketTranscriptSource
nested_items.description: Indicates the setting of the Amazon S3 bucket where the transcript is stored.

nested_items.name: s3BucketName
nested_items.description: The name of the bucket containing the transcript and the associated metadata.

nested_items.name: pathFormat
nested_items.description: The object that contains a path format that will be applied when Amazon Lex reads the transcript file in the bucket you provide. Specify this object if you only want Lex to read a subset of files in your Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: objectPrefixes
nested_items.description: A list of Amazon S3 prefixes that points to sub-folders in the Amazon S3 bucket. Specify this list if you only want Lex to read the files under this set of sub-folders.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: transcriptFormat
nested_items.description: The format of the transcript content. Currently, Genie only supports the Amazon Lex transcript format.

nested_items.name: transcriptFilter
nested_items.description: The object that contains the filter which will be applied when Amazon Lex reads through the Amazon S3 bucket. Specify this object if you want Amazon Lex to read only a subset of the Amazon S3 bucket based on the filter you provide.

nested_items.name: lexTranscriptFilter
nested_items.description: The object representing the filter that Amazon Lex will use to select the appropriate transcript when the transcript format is the Amazon Lex format.

nested_items.name: dateRangeFilter
nested_items.description: The object that contains a date range filter that will be applied to the transcript. Specify this object if you want Amazon Lex to only read the files that are within the date range.

nested_items.name: startDateTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp indicating the start date for the date range filter.

nested_items.name: endDateTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp indicating the end date for the date range filter.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the KMS key that customer use to encrypt their Amazon S3 bucket. Only use this field if your bucket is encrypted using a customer managed KMS key.

nested_items.name: encryptionSetting
nested_items.description: The object representing the passwords that were used to encrypt the data related to the bot recommendation results, as well as the KMS key ARN used to encrypt the associated metadata.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The KMS key ARN used to encrypt the metadata associated with the bot recommendation.

nested_items.name: botLocaleExportPassword
nested_items.description: The password used to encrypt the recommended bot recommendation file.

nested_items.name: associatedTranscriptsPassword
nested_items.description: The password used to encrypt the associated transcript file.

nested_items.name: botRecommendationResults
nested_items.description: The object representing the URL of the bot definition, the URL of the associated transcript and a statistical summary of the bot recommendation results.

nested_items.name: botLocaleExportUrl
nested_items.description: The presigned URL link of the recommended bot definition.

nested_items.name: associatedTranscriptsUrl
nested_items.description: The presigned url link of the associated transcript.

nested_items.name: statistics
nested_items.description: The statistical summary of the bot recommendation results.

nested_items.name: discoveredIntentCount
nested_items.description: The number of recommended intents associated with the bot recommendation.

nested_items.name: slotTypes
nested_items.description: Statistical information about the slot types associated with the bot recommendation results.

nested_items.name: discoveredSlotTypeCount
nested_items.description: The number of recommended slot types associated with the bot recommendation.
